Package com.example.SnakeProyect.controller

Class GameRoomController

java.lang.Object
com.example.SnakeProyect.controller.GameRoomController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/gamerooms") public class GameRoomController extends Object
REST controller for managing game rooms.

  • Method Details

    • createGameRoom

      @PostMapping("/create") public GameRoom createGameRoom(@RequestBody GameRoomRequest request)
      Creates a new game room.
      Parameters:
      request - the request containing game room details.
      Returns:
      the created GameRoom object.

    • getAvailableGameRooms

      @GetMapping("/available") public List<GameRoom> getAvailableGameRooms()
      Retrieves a list of available game rooms.
      Returns:
      a list of available GameRoom objects.

    • joinGameRoom

      @PostMapping("/join") public GameRoom joinGameRoom(@RequestParam String gameId)
      Allows a player to join an existing game room.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game room to join.
      Returns:
      the updated GameRoom object.

    • updateReadyStatus

      @PostMapping("/update-ready-status") public void updateReadyStatus(@RequestParam String gameId, @RequestParam boolean isReady)
      Updates the ready status of a player in a game room.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game room.
      isReady - the ready status of the player.

    • getPlayersInGameRoom

      @GetMapping("/players") public List<String> getPlayersInGameRoom(@RequestParam String gameId)
      Retrieves a list of players in a specific game room.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game room.
      Returns:
      a list of player names in the game room.

    • getReadyStatusInGameRoom

      @GetMapping("/ready-status") public List<Boolean> getReadyStatusInGameRoom(@RequestParam String gameId)
      Retrieves the ready status of players in a specific game room.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game room.
      Returns:
      a list of ready statuses for players in the game room.

    • canStartGame

      @GetMapping("/can-start") public boolean canStartGame(@RequestParam String gameId)
      Checks if a game can be started in a specific game room.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game room.
      Returns:
      true if the game can be started, false otherwise.
